Subsection.Text: No individual may concurrently represent more than one home improvement finance seller in the solicitation or negotiation of any home improvement contract from an owner. The use of a contract form which fails to disclose a named home improvement finance seller is prohibited. No employee of a seller may be authorized to select a home improvement finance seller on behalf of the owner.

No employee of the seller shall accept or pay any compensation on or for a home improvement transaction other than from or for the home improvement finance seller represented with respect to the transaction.
